name: P05
prompt: Security camera footage from wall-mounted camera at corner of house, suburban home side yard with fence and gate at night. Single porch light provides harsh overhead illumination with deep shadows. A person in dark hoodie with hood pulled up, face obscured by hood, average build, moving with deliberate slow pace. They walk along the side of the house, pausing to look at windows and checking the side gate. Methodical movement along property perimeter, testing access points. Fixed camera position, medium field of view along property side, standard security camera lens, IR-tinted footage quality typical of home security systems, slight grain. Realistic human motion, 20-second duration.
